hero.description: ASPPIBRA-DAO integrates legal compliance, Blockchain, and AI to transform physical properties into high-efficiency, liquid assets, managed through decentralized governance with full institutional security.

ecosystem.caption: High-Level Infrastructure
ecosystem.title: Infrastructure Engineering for
ecosystem.description: ASPPIBRA-DAO operates as a high-performance institutional accelerator, integrating strategic value assets into the global RWA ecosystem. We provide the legal architecture and technological robustness required to sophisticate, validate, and scale the real economy under decentralized custody.

reurb.title: Sovereign Asset & Estate Governance
reurb.description: Establishing absolute legal legitimacy for high-value landed assets, upgrading them to institutional standards for sovereign integration into global digital capital markets.

agro.title: Strategic Agro-Industrial Acceleration
agro.description: Connecting elite production chains to advanced on-chain credit systems and sustainable governance models, optimizing the intrinsic value of high-scale yields.

defi.title: Systemic Scale & Liquidity Protocols
defi.description: Expanding capital efficiency by linking real-world assets directly to decentralized global liquidity flows, eliminating logistical friction and maximizing financial performance.

governance.title: Sovereign Governance & Curatorship
governance.description: The Governance Token grants strategic curatorship power over the network. Engage in high-level governance decisions and direct the incubation of next-generation institutional assets.

infrastructure.description: Our infrastructure combines the most secure layers of Web3 with the performance of Edge Computing. We ensure that RWA asset management and your CAD Credential are always available and auditable.

q1.question: What defines ASPPIBRA-DAO and what is its legal basis?
q1.answer: ASPPIBRA is a non-profit private law civil association, established under Art. 44 of the Civil Code[cite: 6]. We adopt the name ASPPIBRA-DAO for digital governance and blockchain technology operations[cite: 6].

q2.question: How does the association facilitate Land Regularization (REURB)?
q2.answer: We act as a specialized technical arm under Law 13,465/2017, promoting the legitimation of complex properties to ensure legal sovereignty and social function.

q3.question: Is the CAD Credential an investment or a financial crypto-asset?
q3.answer: No. Per Art. 6-A, CADs are non-transferable cryptographic membership records[cite: 11]. They are not securities or financial assets and do not offer profit expectations.

q4.question: How does the ecosystem ensure the integrity of asset information?
q4.answer: We use blockchain as cryptographic proof of participation, combined with data protection protocols (LGPD), ensuring records are immutable and auditable[cite: 11, 15].

q5.question: How is the project aligned with sustainability (SDG 2030)?
q5.answer: Our actions are guided by sustainable development and environmental conservation (Art. 225 CF), aligning territorial management with UN Sustainable Development Goals[cite: 9, 10].

q6.question: What are the DAO's control and oversight mechanisms?
q6.answer: We maintain a continuous Compliance Program and oversight by an autonomous Fiscal Council, with annual accountability approved by the General Assembly[cite: 27, 30].

q7.question: How does the association integrate emerging technologies into public services?
q7.answer: We follow the Digital Government Law (Law 14,129/2021) to digitize services and apply AI and blockchain to streamline public interest processes[cite: 10].
